desc.1: Unleashes up to 6 attacks in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: When Jane triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, or performs a move that deals DMG to the enemy, she accumulates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>. Upon reaching the maximum <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>, Jane enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state.
desc.1: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, Jane's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> is increased by 25%. Additionally, if Jane's Anomaly Proficiency exceeds 120, each extra point raises her ATK by 2, up to a maximum of 600.
desc.2: In the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, Jane's skills that deal damage consume <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>. Activating a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> regenerates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>. Jane exits the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state when all of her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct> is consumed.

desc.0: Entering the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state grants Jane one use of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</ct>.
desc.2: Launch rapid consecutive attacks forward, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.3: Hold the button during the consecutive attacks to extend the skill duration. Release <IconNormal /> to trigger the Finishing Move early.
desc.4: Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the consecutive attacks, and Jane takes 40% reduced DMG. Jane is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.
desc.5: Using and damaging an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</ct> while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state generates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: Jane has an extra dodge. Before she enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, she alternates between the two dodges. After entering the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, Jane can pass through enemies in front when dodging.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: If after the first dodge, launch an upward slash in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If after the second dodge, perform a consecutive slashes in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Launch three quick rushing slashes in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: If after the first dodge, unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If after the second dodge, leap up and deliver three consecutive attacks to enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Leaps into the air to launch consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackAerialSweepClearout.name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Leaps into the air to launch multiple consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Weaves between and slashes enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Jane directly enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Weaves between and slashes enemies with a powerful attack in a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Jane directly enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, when the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Leap up and swiftly slash the enemy, then execute a wide sweeping slash across a large area in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Insight
desc: When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> on an enemy in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state and causes the <ct color=#F0D12B>Flinch</ct> effect, the <ct color=#F0D12B>Flinch</ct> effect duration is extended by 5s. <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit against enemies in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state, with a base CRIT Rate of <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> and CRIT DMG of 50%. Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.1%</ct>.

When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> on an enemy in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state and causes the <ct color=#F0D12B>Flinch</ct> effect, the <ct color=#F0D12B>Flinch</ct> effect duration is extended by 5s. <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit against enemies in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state, with a base CRIT Rate of <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct> and CRIT DMG of 50%. Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.11%</ct>.

Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.12%</ct>.

Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.13%</ct>.

Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.14%</ct>.

Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.16%</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> character or shares the same Faction:
desc.1: Jane's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> is increased by 20%. When the enemy is already suffering from an Attribute Anomaly, Jane's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</ct> towards the target is increased by an additional 15%.

1.name: Crime Counsel
1.desc: The maximum uses of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</ct> are increased by one. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, Jane's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> increases by an extra 15% and each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency increases her DMG by 0.1%, up to a maximum increase of 30%.

flavor.0: "A criminal consultant advises on criminology, not on how to actually commit crimes."
flavor.1: Jane suddenly leaned closer and blinked.
flavor.2: "Of course, if you see it as the latter... I won't mind."

2.name: Adapt to the Environment
2.desc: When Jane's attack hits an enemy in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state, or when any squad member triggers <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> on an enemy in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</ct> state, 15% of the enemy's DEF is ignored. Additionally, when <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> DMG triggers a critical hit, the CRIT DMG dealt is increased by an additional 50%.

flavor.0: Gaze into the abyss, and it gazes back. That's only the first step.
flavor.1: "Then you must approach, enter, and understand it. This is the second step."
flavor.2: "The final step... is to resist becoming it."

3.name: Anonymity
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Anonymity â that means to become anyone. Your favorite person, perhaps~"

4.name: Adapt and Thrive
4.desc: When any squad member triggers the <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> effects, all squad members' Attribute Anomaly DMG is increased by 18%, lasting 15s.

flavor.0: "Whether you're a hunter or the hunted usually depends on your perspective. However, I favor a more straightforward assessmentâ"

5.name: Compulsive Hoarder
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Jane's room is filled with all sorts of things, especially fast food.
flavor.1: "Isn't it nice here? There's food within reach everywhere~"

6.name: "Shady" Technique
6.desc: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, Jane's CRIT Rate increases by 20%, and CRIT DMG by 40%. After any squad member inflicts <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, Jane instantly enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion</ct> state, and gains max <ct color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</ct>. When that instance of <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct> triggers a critical hit, Jane performs an additional attack on the target, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> equal to 1,600% of her Anomaly Proficiency.

flavor.0: On the streets, the means don't matter, only the outcome.
flavor.1: "Seeing the darkest desires reveals the most crucial weaknesses."
